name: Kitsch Dance 2017 Master Collection Alpha
description:
somewhere far in space and time, a lone dancer rides his skateboard endlessly. where will he go? why is he going? when will he get there and how? these are but few of many questions to ponder as you ride along, young one

--

Made in 48 hours for the Fixer-Upper Jam

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move

--

Created by Gabby Dumire, Victor Perez, and Calvin Tomblin
